forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun this morning then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain this afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain this afternoon. High 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
